definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
(of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
elegant and graceful posture/splendid, full of content

sentences.english: This is a common theme in the standing poses beginning with Tadasana.
sentences.chinese: 這是從山式開始的站姿的一個共同的主題。

sentences.english: People feeling nervous or unsure of themselves will unconsciously take a guarded stance.
sentences.chinese: 心中不安或不自信的人會無意識地採用防禦式的站姿。

sentences.english: Topic of this paper is to carry out a research on model and control of shield behavior.
sentences.chinese: 論文以此爲選題，開展了盾構機位姿控制模型的研究。

sentences.english: Once you have the posture, you can learn the turn.
sentences.chinese: 一旦掌握好了站姿，你就可以學習轉身了。

sentences.english: Don't just "sit up straight"; engage your core for your best posture.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是坐直，而是要緊縮核心，達到最佳的姿堧。

sentences.english: Hospitality a glass of wine, treasure Suihan posture.
sentences.chinese: 殷勤一杯酒，珍重歲寒姿。

sentences.english: Get right back into Forward Stance once you complete turn.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你徹底轉動了就立刻轉換成側位站姿。

sentences.english: What aspects of your running form would you like to improve?
sentences.chinese: 你跑姿的那一方面需要改進？

sentences.english: His posture would be unsatisfactory for a question mark.
sentences.chinese: 他的站姿就像一個歪歪扭扭的問號。

sentences.english: Is the model body things of osmund appearance useful?
sentences.chinese: 薇姿的塑身用品有用的麼？

sentences.english: Vichy apologized to the blog community.
sentences.chinese: 薇姿在博客社區上道歉。

sentences.english: Standing and sitting straight makes you look confident and full of energy.
sentences.chinese: 挺拔的站姿和坐姿使你看起來充滿精力和自信。

sentences.english: Finally, at every mile marker in the race, think through a head-to-toe inventory of your running form.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在每個里程標記的地方注意你的跑姿。

definition: long or drawn out/remote in time or space/leisurely/to swing/pensive/worried
